snippet.title: Criminals Within - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Criminals Within is a co-op only third-person action-adventure game where each player takes on a unique role in this medieval fantasy kingdom adventure. Engage in skill-based combat, where strategic thinking and quick reflexes are the keys to victory. Work together to solve cooperative puzzles, utilizing each character's strengths to overcome challenges. Take on epic boss battles, facing off against formidable foes that will test your mettle. Criminals Within is launching for consoles and PC at a later date.
